lines.text: Well! Masturbate in hell!

[Jeff gets into a fight with Hoodlum, the Thailand crime boss and after escaping Hoodlum's thugs, the group tries to consider what their options are]
We've had it! That bastard runs the whole damn city! There's no other choice, we've gotta kill him.
And what good's that? Can't kill his whole gang.

[to Sam]
Do you think you could offer him more interest on the $40,000?
That won't work. It's our lives he wants not money.
Are you crazy? Think he'd refuse money?
Money? He's got loads. I made him lose face!

[Sam has a plan to pay off the loan to Hoodlum]
Hey I've got an idea, listen up.
What is it?
Rob a bank?
[everyone is silent when Jeff says this]
Is that it?
I think it's a great plan. If we pull it off, we're rich. And we can go anywhere.
What? Us rob a bank? Sam wake up.
Why not? It's worth a shot.
Yeah, well you guys just keep dreaming. Forget about it. We're in enough shit.
Waht the hell can we do?
Why'd you take the cash? Huh?
[Jeff is so frustrated at the situation, he gets up from the table and leaves]
Check if there's a hole in my underpants?
No! I saw a vomiting crab.
See anything you like?
Yeah, I saw a couple of lice puking.
See anything you like?
Nothing. Maybe just a few scraggly black hairs.
[Deano and Chung are staring hard at each other and it's driving Deano crazy]
What are you looking at huh?
I am allowed to look.
Oh yeah?
I'm not scared of you.

[Deano's ready to fight so he jumps out of his vehicle and orders Chung to get out too]
Get out! Get the fuck out!
We're on a job.
Take me one minute to break you. Scared?
